item.title: Block .DS_Store Files on NAS
item.description: Intro MacOS always write DS_Store files on network share. These files are used by MacOS to store custom attributes but it is useless on non MacOS. So, it is better to clean up these existing DS_Store files and block these files on NAS permanently (Synology). Clean existing .DS_Store files Enable SSH and login to NAS find / -name ".DS_Store" -delete Set VETO files to block .DS_Store on NAS Go to “Control Panel” -> “File Services” -> “Advanced Settings” Check Veto files Input “/.

item.title: Synology Resilio Sync SSL Cert
item.description: Intro Configure the Resilio Sync SSL Cert in Synology Install Resilio Sync Download related package in Resilio Sync website and install the software Configure SSL Cert ssh to synology edit the configure file /usr/local/resiliosync/var/sync.conf add ssl_certificate and ssl_private_key fields after force_http "force_https": true, "ssl_certificate": "/path/to/cert.pem", "ssl_private_key": "/path/to/privkey.pem", restart resilio sync in vi, dd to delete line double check the permission and the path if fail
